name: Potato Potato
description:
During the last minute on this precious planet some priorities are twisted and some are bound.

You work at a weapon testing facility and have to find parts for the latest and most awesomest potato gun demonstration for the visiting leaders. As with all technical demos, however, things don't exactly go as planned.

Controls: WASD - movement, E - pick up or attach a potato gun part.

UnRAR and run PotatoPotato.exe.

Made for UE4 Summer Jam.
